headline: Oracle’s Massive AI Push Resets Priorities And Raises Valuation Questions
summary: Oracle plans to raise about $45 billion to $50 billion through a mix of equity and debt to expand its AI focused cloud infrastructure for customers including OpenAI, Nvidia, and Meta. The company is reviewing its healthcare operations, including a potential sale of Cerner, which it acquired in 2022. Reports also point to potential layoffs affecting up to 30,000 employees as part of a broad restructuring of Oracle's operations. Oracle (NYSE: ORCL) enters this overhaul with a current share...

headline: Qatar Green Data Center Market Report 2025-2030: Ooredoo Q.P.S.C., Vodafone P.Q.S.C., MEEZA Q.P.S.C., and Hyperscalers Microsoft, Oracle, and Google Cloud Drive Expansion
summary: The Qatar Green Data Center Market offers opportunities in leveraging renewable energy expansion and strategic partnerships with technology providers to enhance sustainability and efficiency. The booming cloud services and government backing align with demand for eco-friendly data solutions. The focus is on innovation and reduced carbon footprint.Dublin, Feb. 06, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Qatar Green Data Center Market Size, Share, Growth Drivers, Trends, Opportunities & Forecast 2025-2030"
